website_summaries.verdict: An affordable brace for correcting "text neck" and other postural problems with hemp as one of the key fibers.
pros: Unisex and easy to put on and wear
Several size choices so you get a good fit
cons: It's not as adjustable as some customers would like

customer_reviews.title: Awkward to put on
customer_reviews.text: The waist strap loops through a metal connector. Reaching the connector is quite difficult. I would like to see this connector moved another inch toward the center of the body. This connector easily twists causing the waist strap to twist. The connector could easily be sewed to prevent this twisting.
customer_reviews.author: George S.

customer_reviews.title: Great for seniors-especially for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This thing does subtly improve my posture. But I love the good mid and upper back support when worn during my hobby farm chores. The lightweight neoprene traps moisture and gets a little sweaty outdoors but the device itself isn't noticeable under a blouse or jacket. Yes, the rear shoulder straps are somewhat awkward to adjust so do that prior to doning and final waist cinching . If you are at the upper limit of ht or wt .on their chart, I recommend the larger one-and I'm 5'2".
customer_reviews.author: susan ann herrington

customer_reviews.title: Best Back Brace Ever
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my dad who complains of back pain, he loved the back brace & the cream uses them both together. Definitely works & the cream is better than any other topical pain cream out there.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Rose

customer_reviews.title: Great posture corrector
customer_reviews.text: I have back problems in my upper back between my shoulders and this does wonders for my posture and muscle spasms
customer_reviews.author: Chris Hanks 01

customer_reviews.title: You have to be dedicated to waet
customer_reviews.text: The lower strap is not adjustable and should be for people whom are not large
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOVELTY idea
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea it's slightly made from hemp. But that fact it's supposed to be uncomfortable to remind you to baby better posture is no swelling point to me. It's realistically a novelty idea at the very best.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Mercer

customer_reviews.title: That this brace actually works
customer_reviews.text: The back brace /posture brace works nice helps my back from constant bending and lifting
customer_reviews.author: Duane

customer_reviews.title: Takes some getting use to
customer_reviews.text: It takes a while to get use to it but I just put it on all day and I am getting use to it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good job of providing support!
customer_reviews.text: This product provides really good good support to those who suffer neck problems! It is easy to put on and take off and helps promote good posture. I bought one for my husband as well who suffers from neck strain.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: definitely worth it
customer_reviews.text: ordered this for my mom, it really helps her back.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Taylor

customer_reviews.title: To me, its not worth buying
customer_reviews.text: It hurts my armpits when i wear it. Its so uncomfortable. I thought it was supposed to be but after a while i dont think so. And it itch my underarms too.
customer_reviews.author: fabianie

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable under arms
customer_reviews.text: The straps that go over your shoulders cut in under arm pits and hurts. Even tried it with a thin sweater. Didnt help much. Still uncomfortable. Honestly didnt raise shoulders back
customer_reviews.author: bobbie stinson

customer_reviews.title: also  helps back pain
customer_reviews.text: I wear it 3to4 hours a day and it helps my upper back pain and it is comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helps posture
customer_reviews.text: Helping on my posture. Takes time to get use to.
customer_reviews.author: Darren Chico

customer_reviews.title: Didn't fit right
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected the straps that go under the arm cuts into the skin
customer_reviews.author: Diane Stahl

customer_reviews.title: Nothing
customer_reviews.text: I could feel the pain between my shoulders disappeared right after I put it on. Magnificent!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Feels good when u wear but adjustable wasit buckle comes a bit loose and under ypur armpits can be a bit uncomfortable
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: It is totally worth the price .
customer_reviews.text: I like the posture belt because it relieves back pain , keeps my form straight , and I'm actually sweating off pounds when I wear it .Seriously
customer_reviews.author: tonya

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: I love how soft around the shoulders are! I love it. #tiredoftextneck
customer_reviews.author: Cassidy

customer_reviews.title: Smell rubber
customer_reviews.text: It help my back but there’s a strong smell of rubber from the materials they use hope it will go away
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit correctly
customer_reviews.text: This harness is way to small. The strap that is supposed to go around your waist actually goes around my chest. I wish to return it for the proper size
customer_reviews.author: James Lewis

customer_reviews.title: The difference it instant
customer_reviews.text: The difference in my posture was immediate. It's very comfortable to wear and gives great support.
customer_reviews.author: Roxane W. Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Would definitely be to anyone experiencing the problem of slouching forward
customer_reviews.text: Works great and is comfortable while wearing. Makes you more are of your posture
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Giddens

customer_reviews.title: Great Brace
customer_reviews.text: My hubby loves the brace. He wears it when he’s doing yard or anything else that requires him to bend or use his back. So great
customer_reviews.author: shirley gardner

product_meta.title: Hempvana Arrow Posture - Fully Adjustable Posture Support & Posture Corrector for Upper Body - Helps Correct Slouching, Text Neck and Hunching Over (S/M)
product_meta.description: Size:Small/MediumIn the digital age it's easy to succumb to poor posture. We're constantly looking down at our phones or hunched over our desks over our computers. Luckily, Hempvana Arrow Posture can help. The back posture brace gently pulls your shoulders back to help align your spine, which can help relieve pain. Unlike heavy, bulky posture correctors, Hempvana Arrow Posture is made with hemp fibers, making the back brace lightweight and breathable. Simply slip the straps over your shoulders and fasten. You'll notice that you'll stand taller the moment you put it on! With padded straps that are super-comfortable and cradle you, Hempvana Arrow Posture gently pulls your shoulders back while reinforcing your slouched spine. It's virtually invisible underneath your clothing! Why suffer with poor posture when you can easily correct it stand straight and tall with Hempvana Arrow Posture?
feature_bullets: HELPS CORRECT POSTURE: the back brace posture corrector gently keeps spine and neck aligned for better posture support for women and men. We are the #1 Hemp Pain Brand in The USA*. AC Nielsen report on file.
MADE WITH HEMP FIBER: Hempvana Arrow Posture back corrector is made with hemp fibers that make the posture brace so lightweight and comfortable
FULLY ADJUSTABLE: when you wear Hempvana Arrow Posture, it will feel like a custom support garment, thanks to fully customization straps
EASY TO WEAR: simply put Hempvana Arrow Posture on and go about your day - it's so comfortable you'll probably forget you're wearing it!
INCLUDED: one (1) Hempvana Arrow Posture support garment in S/M (unisex)
